title: Resolve Customer Fuel Quality Claim
description: A commercial fleet customer claims a recent diesel delivery was off-spec and caused engine problems. A quality specialist must investigate.

tasks.description: Retrieve the Certificate of Analysis (COA) for the specific fuel batch delivered to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The official quality report for the delivered batch is found.

tasks.description: Review the COA to confirm that all properties (e.g., cetane number, sulfur content) were within specification when it left the terminal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The COA shows the batch met all quality specifications.

tasks.description: Arrange to have a sample taken from the customer's storage tank for third-party testing to rule out contamination.
tasks.expected_outcome: A third-party lab is scheduled to collect and test a sample from the customer's site.
